verses.verse: לְדָוִ֨ד ׀ <S%H1732><s%> [A Psalm] of David שָׁפְטֵ֤נִי <S%H8199><s%> Judge יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> me O LORD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> in אֲ֭נִי <S%H589><s%> my בְּתֻמִּ֣י <S%H8537><s%> in mine integrity הָלַ֑כְתִּי <S%H1980><s%> for I have walked וּבַיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> also in the LORD בָּ֝טַ֗חְתִּי <S%H982><s%> I have trusted לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> without אֶמְעָֽד׃ <S%H4571><s%> [therefore] I shall not slide

בְּחָנֵ֣נִי <S%H974><s%> Examine יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> me O LORD וְנַסֵּ֑נִי <S%H5254><s%> and prove [צְרֹופָה כ] (צָרְפָ֖ה <S%H6884><s%> cast ק) כִלְיוֹתַ֣י <S%H3629><s%> my reins וְלִבִּֽי׃ <S%H3820><s%> and my heart

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For חַ֭סְדְּךָ <S%H2617><s%> For thy lovingkindness לְנֶ֣גֶד <S%H5048><s%> about עֵינָ֑י <S%H5869><s%> [is] before mine eyes וְ֝הִתְהַלַּ֗כְתִּי <S%H1980><s%> and I have walked בַּאֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H571><s%> in thy truth

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor יָ֭שַׁבְתִּי <S%H3427><s%> I have not sat עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with מְתֵי־ <S%H4962><s%> persons שָׁ֑וְא <S%H7723><s%> with vain וְעִ֥ם <S%H5973><s%> with נַ֝עֲלָמִ֗ים <S%H5956><s%> with dissemblers לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor אָבֽוֹא׃ <S%H935><s%> neither will I go in

שָׂ֭נֵאתִי <S%H8130><s%> I have hated קְהַ֣ל <S%H6951><s%> the congregation מְרֵעִ֑ים <S%H7489><s%> of evil doers וְעִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <S%H7563><s%> with the wicked לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and I will not אֵשֵֽׁב׃ <S%H3427><s%> and will not sit

אֶרְחַ֣ץ <S%H7364><s%> I will wash בְּנִקָּי֣וֹן <S%H5356><s%> in innocency כַּפָּ֑י <S%H3709><s%> mine hands וַאֲסֹבְבָ֖ה <S%H5437><s%> so will I compass אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִזְבַּחֲךָ֣ <S%H4196><s%> thine altar יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> O LORD

לַ֭שְׁמִעַ <S%H8085><s%> That I may publish בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> with the voice תּוֹדָ֑ה <S%H8426><s%> of thanksgiving וּ֝לְסַפֵּ֗ר <S%H5608><s%> and tell כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all נִפְלְאוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6381><s%> of all thy wondrous works

יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> LORD אָ֭הַבְתִּי <S%H157><s%> I have loved מְע֣וֹן <S%H4583><s%> the habitation בֵּיתֶ֑ךָ <S%H1004><s%> of thy house וּ֝מְק֗וֹם <S%H4725><s%> and the place מִשְׁכַּ֥ן <S%H4908><s%> dwelleth כְּבוֹדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3519><s%> where thine honour

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> Nor תֶּאֱסֹ֣ף <S%H622><s%> Gather עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with חַטָּאִ֣ים <S%H2400><s%> with sinners נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> not my soul וְעִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אַנְשֵׁ֖י <S%H376><s%> men דָמִ֣ים <S%H1818><s%> with bloody חַיָּֽי׃ <S%H2416><s%> nor my life

אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whose בִּידֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H3027><s%> In whose hands זִמָּ֑ה <S%H2154><s%> [is] mischief וִֽ֝ימִינָ֗ם <S%H3225><s%> and their right hand מָ֣לְאָה <S%H4390><s%> is full שֹּֽׁחַד׃ <S%H7810><s%> of bribes
וַ֭אֲנִי <S%H589><s%> my בְּתֻמִּ֥י <S%H8537><s%> in mine integrity אֵלֵ֗ךְ <S%H1980><s%> shall walk פְּדֵ֣נִי <S%H6299><s%> redeem וְחָנֵּֽנִי׃ <S%H2603><s%> me and be merciful

רַ֭גְלִי <S%H7272><s%> My foot עָֽמְדָ֣ה <S%H5975><s%> standeth בְמִישׁ֑וֹר <S%H4334><s%> in an even place בְּ֝מַקְהֵלִ֗ים <S%H4721><s%> in the congregations אֲבָרֵ֥ךְ <S%H1288><s%> will I bless יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD
